title: Akai Shouzou: Char, Soshite Frontal e (Portrait of the Red)
synopsis: A recap of Gundam, Gundam Z, Gundam ZZ, and Char's Counterattack as experienced by Char Aznable, as well as a precursor to Gundam Unicorn.
related_anime: ['Mobile Suit Gundam', "Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack", 'Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ', 'Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam', 'Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn']
